      • users

        public static play.mvc.Result users(java.lang.String accessToken)
        List all the visible users (only admins can do that).
        Returns:
        An HTTP JSON response containing the properties of all the users

      • add

        public static play.mvc.Result add(java.lang.String accessToken)
        Create a new user. The user properties are contained into the HTTP Request body as JSON format.
        Returns:
        An HTTP JSON response containing the properties of the created user

        Delete the user identified by the id parameter.
        Parameters:
        id - : the user identifier
        Returns:
        An HTTP response that specifies if the deletion succeeded or not

      • update

        public static play.mvc.Result update(java.lang.Integer id,
                     java.lang.String accessToken)
        Update the user identified by the id parameter. The new user properties are contained into the HTTP Request body as JSON format.
        Parameters:
        id - : the user identifier
        Returns:
        An HTTP JSON response containing the new properties of edited user
